mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COM_MENU ( MENU_CODE, MENUNM, EXPS_ORDR, USE_YN, DLTE_YN, MENU_URL, USER_DVID, MENU_LEVL, MENU_EXPL, IMG2_URL, IMG1_URL, TARGET_LOCT, PRTCODE , TITLE_IMG_URL , REGID, REGDATE, UPDID, UPDDATE ) VALUES ( #{MAX_MENU_CODE}, #{MENUNM}, #{EXPS_ORDR}, #{USE_YN}, 'N', #{MENU_URL}, #{USER_DVID}, #{MENU_LEVL}, #{MENU_EXPL}, #{IMG2_URL}, #{IMG1_URL}, #{TARGET_LOCT}, #{PRTCODE}, #{TITLE_IMG_URL} , #{SESSION_USR_ID}, GETDATE(), #{SESSION_USR_ID}, GETDATE() )

SELECT MENU_CODE /*메뉴 코드 */, MENUNM /*메뉴명 */, EXPS_ORDR /*정렬순서*/, USE_YN /*사용유무 */, DLTE_YN /*삭제여부 */, MENU_URL /*메뉴 URL */, USER_DVID /*사용자구분 */, MENU_LEVL /*메뉴 레벨 */, USER_DVID /*사용자구분 */, MENU_EXPL /*메뉴 설명 */, IMG2_URL /*이미지2 URL */, IMG1_URL /*이미지1 URL */, TARGET_LOCT /*실행위치 */, PRTCODE, TITLE_IMG_URL
FROM COM_MENU WHERE DLTE_YN ='N'
AND MENU_CODE = #{MENU_CODE}
ORDER BY MENU_LEVL ASC

SELECT
B.MENU_CODE, B.MENUNM, B.USER_DVID, B.AUTH_CODE, A.AUTHNM, A.AUTHCODE AS ROLE_CODE
FROM (
SELECT
M.MENU_CODE, M.MENUNM, P.AUTH_CODE, M.USER_DVID
FROM COM_MENU M , TB_AUTHGRUP_MAPG P WHERE M.DLTE_YN = 'N' AND M.MENU_CODE !='ROOT' AND M.MENU_CODE = #{MENU_CODE} AND M.MENU_CODE = P.MENU_CODE
) B RIGHT OUTER JOIN TB_AUTHGRUP A ON A.AUTHCODE = B.AUTH_CODE WHERE A.DLTE_YN = 'N'

SELECT M.MENU_CODE, M.MENUNM, M.USER_DVID, M.MENU_URL, M.IMG2_URL, M.IMG1_URL FROM COM_MENU M LEFT JOIN TB_AUTHGRUP_MAPG A ON M.MENU_CODE = A.MENU_CODE WHERE M.DLTE_YN = 'N' AND M.PRTCODE ='ROOT' AND M.USER_DVID = 'FRONT' AND A.AUTH_CODE = #{AUTH_CODE}

WITH MENU AS (SELECT TBLA.MENU_CODE, TBLA.MENUNM AS MENUNM, TBLA.EXPS_ORDR, TBLA.USE_YN, TBLA.DLTE_YN, TBLA.MENU_URL, TBLA.USER_DVID, TBLA.MENU_LEVL, TBLA.MENU_EXPL, TBLA.IMG2_URL, TBLA.IMG1_URL, TBLA.TARGET_LOCT, TBLA.PRTCODE, TBLA.TITLE_IMG_URL, CONVERT(VARCHAR(255),'0') AS SORT FROM COM_MENU TBLA JOIN TB_AUTHGRUP_MAPG A ON TBLA.MENU_CODE = A.MENU_CODE WHERE A.AUTH_CODE = #{AUTH_CODE} AND TBLA.PRTCODE = 'ROOT' UNION ALL SELECT TBLB.MENU_CODE, TBLB.MENUNM MENUNM, TBLB.EXPS_ORDR, TBLB.USE_YN, TBLB.DLTE_YN, TBLB.MENU_URL, TBLB.USER_DVID, TBLB.MENU_LEVL, TBLB.MENU_EXPL, TBLB.IMG2_URL, TBLB.IMG1_URL, TBLB.TARGET_LOCT, TBLB.PRTCODE, TBLB.TITLE_IMG_URL, CONVERT(VARCHAR(255), RTRIM(TBLC.SORT) + '/' + REPLACE(STR(TBLB.EXPS_ORDR,3),' ','0')) AS SORT FROM COM_MENU TBLB JOIN TB_AUTHGRUP_MAPG A ON TBLB.MENU_CODE = A.MENU_CODE JOIN MENU TBLC ON TBLB.PRTCODE = TBLC.MENU_CODE WHERE A.AUTH_CODE = #{AUTH_CODE} ) SELECT * FROM MENU WHERE DLTE_YN='N' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MENU_CODE !='ROOT' AND USER_DVID = 'FRONT' ORDER BY SORT OPTION (MAXRECURSION 5)

SELECT M.MENU_CODE, M.MENUNM, M.USER_DVID, M.MENU_URL, M.IMG2_URL FROM COM_MENU M LEFT JOIN TB_AUTHGRUP_MAPG A ON M.MENU_CODE = A.MENU_CODE WHERE M.DLTE_YN = 'N' AND M.PRTCODE ='ROOT' AND M.USER_DVID = 'FRONT' AND A.AUTH_CODE = #{AUTH_CODE}
